name: lenses
keyvalue
relations.query: select image.id as image_id, annotation.ns as ns, annotation_mapvalue.name as key_property, annotation_mapvalue.value as value from image join imageannotationlink on image.id=imageannotationlink.parent join annotation on imageannotationlink.child = annotation.id join annotation_mapvalue on annotation.id = annotation_mapvalue.annotation_id;
